mapper.select: SELECT d.account_number, d.id, d.account_password, d.balance, b.value as bank_book_key, d.nick_name, date_format(d.reg_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as reg_date, d.main_account FROM dw_account d LEFT JOIN bank_book b ON d.bank_book_key = b.key WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY main_account DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dw_account(account_number, id, account_password, balance, bank_book_key, nick_name, main_account) VALUES( (SELECT CONCAT('0005-031-', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(account_number, 10)), 0) + 1, 5, 0)) from dw_account b), #{id}, #{accountPassword}, #{balance}, #{bankBookKey}, #{nickName}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT d.account_number, d.id, d.account_password, d.balance, b.value as bank_book_key, d.nick_name, date_format(d.reg_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as reg_date, d.main_account FROM dw_account d LEFT JOIN bank_book b ON d.bank_book_key = b.key WHERE account_number = #{accountNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE dw_account SET main_account = 'N' WHERE id = #{id}
